
# This file was generated by the build system used internally in the Yandex monorepo.
# Only simple modifications are allowed (adding source-files to targets, adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories). These modifications will be ported to original
# ya.make files by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be ported back to the
# original buildsystem will not be accepted.



add_executable(library-yql-minikql-invoke_builtins-llvm-ut)
target_compile_options(library-yql-minikql-invoke_builtins-llvm-ut PRIVATE
  -DUSE_CURRENT_UDF_ABI_VERSION
)
target_include_directories(library-yql-minikql-invoke_builtins-llvm-ut PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/ydb/library/yql/minikql/invoke_builtins
)
target_link_libraries(library-yql-minikql-invoke_builtins-llvm-ut PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-linux-headers
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  cpp-testing-unittest_main
  minikql-codegen-llvm
  minikql-invoke_builtins-llvm
  minikql-computation-llvm
  llvm12-lib-IR
  lib-ExecutionEngine-MCJIT
  llvm12-lib-Linker
  lib-Target-X86
  Target-X86-AsmParser
  lib-Transforms-IPO
  yql-public-udf
  udf-service-exception_policy
  yql-sql-pg_dummy
)
target_link_options(library-yql-minikql-invoke_builtins-llvm-ut PRIVATE
  -ldl
  -lrt
  -Wl,--no-as-needed
  -fPIC
  -fPIC
  -lpthread
  -lrt
  -ldl
)
target_sources(library-yql-minikql-invoke_builtins-llvm-ut PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/contrib/ydb/library/yql/minikql/invoke_builtins/llvm/ut/mkql_builtins_ut.cpp
)
set_property(
  TARGET
  library-yql-minikql-invoke_builtins-llvm-ut
  PROPERTY
  SPLIT_FACTOR
  10
)
add_yunittest(
  NAME
  library-yql-minikql-invoke_builtins-llvm-ut
  TEST_TARGET
  library-yql-minikql-invoke_builtins-llvm-ut
  TEST_ARG
  --print-before-suite
  --print-before-test
  --fork-tests
  --print-times
  --show-fails
)
set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  library-yql-minikql-invoke_builtins-llvm-ut
  PROPERTY
  LABELS
  MEDIUM
)
set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  library-yql-minikql-invoke_builtins-llvm-ut
  PROPERTY
  PROCESSORS
  1
)
set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  library-yql-minikql-invoke_builtins-llvm-ut
  PROPERTY
  TIMEOUT
  600
)
copy_file(
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/ydb/library/yql/minikql/invoke_builtins/mkql_builtins_ut.cpp
  ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/contrib/ydb/library/yql/minikql/invoke_builtins/llvm/ut/mkql_builtins_ut.cpp
)
target_allocator(library-yql-minikql-invoke_builtins-llvm-ut
  cpp-malloc-jemalloc
)
vcs_info(library-yql-minikql-invoke_builtins-llvm-ut)
